subtitle: A heavenly and comforting Hallowe'en soup. Guaranteed to fend off evil spirits - and hunger pangs.

method.text: Quarter pumpkin, scoop out seeds and cut into large chunks. Place in a roasting tin. Add onion, apples, garlic and coriander seeds. Add oil and toss together. Grill for 15-20 min or until tender and brown. Cool slightly.
When cool enough to handle, use a spoon to scoop the pumpkin flesh into a blender. Add the rest of the roast apples and vegetables and half the stock. Blend until smooth.
Transfer to a large pan. Add remaining stock and creme fraiche. Season to taste. Gently bring to boil before serving.

title: Roast apple and pumpkin soup
